resources.string:
Open BART is being designed with the respect that the Android community deserves! This is OUR app, so when you find a bug or need a feature, you let me know! Go to the "About" screen in the settings menu for my contact info.
Happy BARTing. May you always avoid the smelly trains!
Oh, and Open BART is open-source. Check it out on github!

string-array.name: aboutDialog
string-array.item:
Open BART is open source software, so it belongs to all of us. Check out the code on github.

When you find a bug or need a feature contact me at davidpbrodsky@gmail.com.

Let\'s make this thing better!
